description: Try our easy to follow Rocky Road Hot Cross Buns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rocky Road Hot Cross Buns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 hot cross buns with cadbury chocolate

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 5 minutes, then remove tray from oven and flatten the rocky road mallows with the back of a spoon. Sandwich halves together with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream.
